history.text: Hi there! To quote your motorcycle, I need your VIN.
The bike is in storage for winter, 2 hours away
I'll need your previous insurance declaration page to verify your claims history.
I switched insurers 3 times in 2 years, this is going to be a hassle to find all that
Please provide the odometer reading from your vehicle.
I'd have to go outside to check that, it's freezing right now
What's your mortgage company name and loan number?
Ugh I'd have to dig through my paperwork for that
I need your spouse's driver's license number to add them.
He's traveling for work this week, I don't have access to his stuff
Can you send a photo of any vehicle damage?
The scratch is tiny and hard to photograph, my phone camera isn't that good
What's your bank routing number for autopay setup?
I'm not giving banking info over text message, that seems sketchy
I need the exact purchase date of your vehicle.
It was like 3 years ago, I'd have to find the bill of sale
What security features does your home have? Alarm system brand and monitoring company?
I have no idea what brand our alarm is, my landlord set it up
Please upload your current declarations page showing coverage limits.
I think I threw that away when it came in the mail, let me check if I can find it online
Do you want to add a PLUP to your policy?
A what now?
Your premium includes a CSL of $300k.
What does CSL mean?
Would you like OEM parts coverage or aftermarket?
I don't know the difference honestly
Your BI/PD limits are currently 25/50/25. Recommended minimum is 100/300/100.
Those numbers mean nothing to me, can you explain in English?
Reply A for actual cash value or B for agreed value coverage.
What's the difference between those two?
Is your vehicle garaged or exposed?
It's in my driveway... is that garaged or exposed?
Do you want to stack your UM coverage?
Stack it? Like on top of something? I don't get it
Select your tort option: Full Tort or Limited Tort?
Tort? Like the dessert?
Would you like to proceed with this quote?
Yeah but I'm driving right now, can't really text
No problem! Text back when you're stopped.
Your quote is ready! $89/month.
That's pretty good! Let me compare with one more company first
Ready to finalize your policy?
I need to wait until payday, that's Friday
Thanks for the info! Any questions about the coverage?
Nope, all good for now. I'll be in touch!
What's your date of birth?
March 15, 1985
Got it! And your current address?
How many miles do you drive annually?
Maybe 10-12k a year
Perfect. Do you use your vehicle for work commuting?
Your policy is now active! Safe driving!
Awesome, thanks for making this easy!
Just checking in - still interested in that quote?
Yes! Sorry been crazy busy at work. Can we continue tomorrow?
What is your social security number? This is needed for the credit check.
I really don't want to share my SSN via text
Please provide proof of prior insurance - a screenshot of your dec page works.
My old insurance was with my ex, I don't have access to that account anymore
I need to verify your identity. Can you send a photo of your driver's license?
I'm uncomfortable sending photos of my ID over text
What's the ACV of your vehicle?
I have no idea, how would I know that?
You can check KBB.com for an estimate!
That seems like extra work, can't you just look it up?
